languages.text: {n}Стракс прикладывает кулак к груди и церемониально произносит:{/n} "Ибо таков приговор. Я защищал Лекс Империалис и его блюстителей. На этом пути я совершил ошибку. Да ниспошлет Император более достойного маршала для Арбитес".

{n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."
languages.original_text: {n}Стракс прикладывает кулак к груди и церемониально произносит:{/n} "Ибо таков приговор. Я защищал Лекс Империалис и его блюстителей. На этом пути я совершил ошибку. Да ниспошлет Император более достойного маршала для Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

{n}Strachs brings a closed fist to his chest and says solemnly,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I protected the Lex Imperialis and those who enforce its word. I have erred in my duty. May the Emperor send the Arbites a Marshal who is better than I."

{n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

{n}Strachs brings a closed fist to his chest and says solemnly,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I protected the Lex Imperialis and those who enforce its word. I have erred in my duty. May the Emperor send the Arbites a Marshal who is better than I."

{n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

{n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

{n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and says ceremonially:{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier marshal."

{n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

languages.text: {n}Strachs presst eine Faust gegen seine Brust und erklärt feierlich:{/n} "Und Euer Urteil ist endgültig. Ich habe das Lex Imperia und seine Wächter beschützt. Ich habe auf diesem Pfad geirrt. Möge der Imperator den Arbites einen würdigeren Marschall schicken."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs presst eine Faust gegen seine Brust und erklärt feierlich:{/n} "Und Euer Urteil ist endgültig. Ich habe das Lex Imperia und seine Wächter beschützt. Ich habe auf diesem Pfad geirrt. Möge der Imperator den Arbites einen würdigeren Marschall schicken."

languages.text: {n}Strachs porte son poing à sa poitrine et répond sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Et votre jugement est définitif. Je protégeais la Lex Imperialis et ses gardiens. Je me suis fourvoyé. Puisse l'Empereur envoyer à l'Arbites un maréchal plus digne que moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs porte son poing à sa poitrine et répond sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Et votre jugement est définitif. Je protégeais la Lex Imperialis et ses gardiens. Je me suis fourvoyé. Puisse l'Empereur envoyer à l'Arbites un maréchal plus digne que moi. »

languages.text: {n}斯塔克斯握紧了一只拳头，按在胸前，郑重地开了口。{/n}“你的判决就是最终判决。我曾守护过帝国律法，也曾保护过律法的守护者，但我却踏上了歧途。愿帝皇为法务部指派一位更加出色的元帅。”
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

traits.locale_text: {n}斯塔克斯握紧了一只拳头，按在胸前，郑重地开了口。{/n}“你的判决就是最终判决。我曾守护过帝国律法，也曾保护过律法的守护者，但我却踏上了歧途。愿帝皇为法务部指派一位更加出色的元帅。”

languages.text: {n}Strachs se lleva el puño al pecho y declara solemnemente:{/n} «Su veredicto es definitivo. Mi cometido era proteger la Lex Imperialis y a sus guardianes, pero he fallado en mi deber. Ruego que el Emperador envíe al Arbites un Mariscal más digno».
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs se lleva el puño al pecho y declara solemnemente:{/n} «Su veredicto es definitivo. Mi cometido era proteger la Lex Imperialis y a sus guardianes, pero he fallado en mi deber. Ruego que el Emperador envíe al Arbites un Mariscal más digno».

languages.text: {n}ストラッチスは胸に拳を当て、厳かに宣言した。{/n}「そして、あなたの裁きが最終決定です。私はレックス・インペリアとその守護者たちを守ろうとしていました。その道で私はあやまちを犯しました。皇帝陛下が高等裁定局に、よりふさわしい将帥を遣わされんことを」
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチスは胸に拳を当て、厳かに宣言した。{/n}「そして、あなたの裁きが最終決定です。私はレックス・インペリアとその守護者たちを守ろうとしていました。その道で私はあやまちを犯しました。皇帝陛下が高等裁定局に、よりふさわしい将帥を遣わされんことを」

languages.text: {n}Strachs, yumruğunu göğsüne götürüp vakur bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hükmünüz nihaidir. Lex İmperialis'i ve onun kelamını yerine getirenleri koruyup gözettim. Vazifemde büyük kusur işledim. İmparator, Arbites'e benden daha iyi bir Miralay bahşetsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "And your judgement is final. I was protecting the Lex Imperialis and its guardians. I erred on that path. May the Emperor send the Arbites a worthier Marshal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs, yumruğunu göğsüne götürüyor ve vakur bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hükmünüz nihaidir. Lex İmperialis'i ve onun kelamını yerine getirenleri koruyup gözettim. Vazifemde büyük kusur işledim. İmparator, Arbites'e benden daha iyi bir Miralay bahşetsin."

{n}Strachs yumruğunu göğsüne götürüyor ve vakur bir sesle konuşuyor{/n} "Hükmünüz nihaidir. Lex İmperialis'i ve onun kelamını yerine getirenleri koruyup gözettim. Görevimde büyük kusur işledim. İmparator, Arbites'e benden daha iyi bir Miralay bahşetsin."
